ModMetadata.Name: Stationeers Logic Extended
ModMetadata.Author: SLE Team
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Stationeers Logic Extended (SLE)[/h1]
Expands IC10 with [b]230 new LogicTypes[/b] across [b]35 device types[/b].
[h2]Requirements[/h2] [olist] [*] [url=https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/releases]BepInEx 5.4[/url] - Extract to game folder [*] [url=https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad/releases]StationeersLaunchPad[/url] - Extract to BepInEx/plugins [*] Subscribe to this mod [/olist]
[h2]Supported Devices[/h2]
[b]Satellite Dish (19)[/b] - ContactIndex, ContactCount, FilterMode, ContactShuttleType, ContactLifetime, ContactResolved, ContactContacted, DishWattageOnContact, DishIsInterrogating +more
[b]Daylight Sensor (8)[/b] - TimeOfDay, IsEclipse, EclipseRatio, DaysPast, DayLengthSeconds, Latitude, Longitude, WeatherSolarRatio
[b]Hydroponics (10)[/b] - LightExposure, IsLitByGrowLight, WaterMoles, PlantGrowthEfficiency, BreathingEfficiency, TemperatureEfficiency +more
[b]Harvester (10)[/b] - HasTray, IsHarvesting, IsPlanting, ArmState, HasImportPlant, ImportPlantHash, FertilizerCycles +more
[b]Pipe Analyzer (26)[/b] - PartialPressure (all 9 gases), TotalMolesGasses/Liquids, Combustion data, [b]NEW:[/b] PipeStressRatio, PipeIsStressed, PipeDamageRatio, PipeIsBurst, PipeDamageType, NetworkHasFault, NetworkWorstDamage
[b]Furnace (12)[/b] - FurnaceTemperature, FurnacePressure, FurnaceTotalMoles, FurnaceInflamed, FurnaceMode, FurnaceOverpressure, FurnaceStressed, FurnaceHasBlown +more
[b]Advanced Furnace (+4)[/b] - MinSettingInput, MaxSettingInput, MinSettingOutput, MaxSettingOutput
[b]Arc Furnace (4)[/b] - ArcFurnaceActivate (readable!), ImportStackSize, SmeltingPower, ArcFurnaceIsSmelting
[b]Filtration Machine (13)[/b] - FilterSlotIndex (r/w), FilterSlotCount, FilterQuantity, FilterIsLow, FilterIsEmpty, FilterTypeHash, FilterLife +more
[b]Air Conditioner (4)[/b] - ACEnergyMoved, ACIsFullyConnected, ACPowerUsed, ACEfficiency
[b]Wall Cooler (4)[/b] - CoolerIsEnvironmentOkay, CoolerIsPipeOkay, CoolerPowerUsed, CoolerEnergyMoved
[b]Wall Heater (5)[/b] - HeaterIsEnvironmentOkay, HeaterPowerUsed, HeaterEnergyTransfer, HeaterMaxTemperature
[b]Active Vent (3)[/b] - VentFlowStatus (0-6), VentIsConnected, VentPowerUsed
[b]Battery (6)[/b] - PowerDelta, BatteryIsSubmerged, InputSubmergedTicks, OutputSubmergedTicks, BatteryIsEmpty, BatteryIsCharged
[b]Solar Panel (9)[/b] - SolarVisibility, SolarDamageRatio, SolarDamageTotal, SolarHealth, SolarEfficiency, SolarIsOperable, SolarIsBroken, SolarMovementSpeedH, SolarMovementSpeedV
[b]H2 Combustor (4)[/b] - H2CombustorProcessedMoles, H2CombustorUsedPower, H2CombustorIsOperable, H2CombustorCodeError
[b]Electrolyzer (4)[/b] - ElectrolyzerProcessedMoles, ElectrolyzerUsedPower, ElectrolyzerIsOperable, ElectrolyzerCodeError
[b]Condensation/Evaporation Chambers (5)[/b] - ChamberEnergyTransfer, ChamberIsOperable, ChamberVolume, ChamberHeatExchangeRatio, ChamberLiquidRatio
[b]Fabricator/Printer (6)[/b] - FabricatorCurrentIndex, FabricatorRecipeCount, FabricatorCurrentTier, FabricatorTimeMultiplier, FabricatorPowerUsed, FabricatorMakingIndex
[b]Advanced Composter (8)[/b] - ComposterGrindProgress, ComposterBatchProgress, ComposterDecayCount, ComposterNormalCount, ComposterBiomassCount, ComposterPowerUsed, ComposterCanProcess, ComposterIsOperable
[b]AIMeE Bot (8)[/b] - [b]NEW:[/b] RobotIsStorageEmpty, RobotIsStorageFull, RobotIsOperable, RobotBatteryRatio, RobotIsBusy, RobotDamageRatio, RobotStorageCount, RobotStorageCapacity
[b]Autominer Small (7)[/b] - [b]NEW:[/b] QuarryDrillState, QuarryOreCount, QuarryDepth, QuarryMaxDepth, QuarryIsDrillFinished, QuarryIsTransporting, QuarryIsDelivering
[b]Ogre (6)[/b] - [b]NEW:[/b] OgreState, OgreOreCount, OgrePosition, OgreMiningComplete, OgreIsReturning, OgreQueueFull
[b]Recycler (5)[/b] - [b]NEW:[/b] RecyclerReagentTotal, RecyclerIsExporting, RecyclerAtCapacity, RecyclerIdleTicks, RecyclerIsProcessing
[b]Stirling Engine (6)[/b] - [b]NEW:[/b] StirlingHotTemperature, StirlingColdTemperature, StirlingTemperatureDelta, StirlingEfficiency, StirlingMaxPower, StirlingIsConnected
[b]Rocket Miner (4)[/b] - [b]NEW:[/b] RocketMiningProgress, RocketNextOreHash, RocketMiningQuantity, RocketIsMining
[b]Landing Pad Center (5)[/b] - [b]NEW:[/b] PadContactStatus (fixes vanilla read!), PadIsTraderReady, PadHasContact, PadIsLocked, PadWaypointHeight
[b]Area Power Controller (1)[/b] - [b]NEW:[/b] APCMaximumPower (Battery + Network capacity combined)
[b]Other:[/b] Wind Turbine (4), Gas Fuel Gen (6), Solid Fuel Gen (1), Weather Station (2), Deep Miner (2), Centrifuge (4)
[h2]Features[/h2] [list] [*] All LogicTypes as IC10 named constants [*] Stationpedia integration [*] GREEN = revealed data, BLUE = new functionality [/list]
[h2]Example[/h2] [code] l r0 dish ContactCount l r1 furnace FurnaceTemperature l r2 battery BatteryIsCharged l r3 solar SolarEfficiency l r4 composter ComposterBatchProgress [/code]
[h2]Ranges[/h2] 1000-1039: Dish | 1100-1103: Centrifuge | 1110-1119: Sensor | 1120-1249: Power | 1160-1199: Farming | 1210-1228: Battery/Solar | 1230-1249: Electrolysis | 1250-1292: Pipe Analyzer | 1300-1339: Furnaces | 1400-1419: Filtration | 1500-1549: HVAC | 1600-1629: Processing | 1700-1707: Robot | 1720-1726: Quarry | 1740-1745: Ogre | 1760-1764: Recycler | 1780-1785: Stirling | 1800-1803: RocketMiner | 1820-1824: LandingPad | 1830: APC
[hr][/hr] [i]Active development - suggestions welcome![/i] [b]Compatibility:[/b] Custom values 1000+ avoid vanilla conflicts
